text:
@Yamiche @jonathanvswan Right. Overblown.

“I was asking a question sarcastically to reporters like you just to see what would happen,” he said early Friday afternoon, just as the coronavirus death toll in the U.S. surpassed 50,000. https://t.co/2zTQe5kQBZ
